page.title: 13BROUGHTON SCHOOL`S JUBILEE
page.content: BROUGHTON SCHOOL OPENED 50 YEARS AGO ON MAY 2ND, 1935.ON MAY 1ST, 1985, THE SCHOOL CELEBRATED ITS GOLDEN JUBILEE.WHEN IT OPENED 50 YEARS AGO THE PEOPLE FROM THE OTHER SCHOOL MARCHED UP TO THEIR NEW SCHOOL.THEY HAD MAY POLE DANCING.THIS YEAR, WE HAD A MAY POLE TOO AND COUNTRY DANCING IN BOTH THE MORNING AND AFTERNOON. WE ALSO HAD A MAY QUEEN WHO WAS LEELA FORDHAM.EVERY GIRL AND BOY WAS PRESENTED WITH A MUG FROM THE MAYOR OF KETTERING.THE MUG HAD A PICTURE OF THE SCHOOL ON IT.IT COST 85p BUT THE CHILDREN GOT IT FREE.YOU COULD BUY SOME PENS AND BADGES IF YOU WANTED TO.THE BADGE WOULD COST 15p AND THE PENS WOULD COST 25p.WE COPIED THE OPENING CEREMONY WHICH WAS IN MAY 1935.WE SANG THE SAME SONGS. THE LORD LIEUTENANT OF THE COUNTY CAME AS WELL.
